personal_info.name: Leonardo A. Pinheiro
personal_info.about_me: Throughout my web development journey, I specialized in Angular, honing my skills to build dynamic, responsive, and high-performance interfaces. After years of experience in the frontend area and understanding the market, I am focused on improving my studies to enter the data science area.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.responsibilities: Developed a platform for financial advisors using AngularJS and Angular. Implemented Microfrontend architecture with Nginx. Collaborated with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.responsibilities: Participated in the migration of a billing system from VB6 to Java and Angular. Developed over 200 functionalities for client management and billing processes. Integrated with CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using Angular. Contributed to the migration project for the Santander billing system. Worked on client-side and server-side logic.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.responsibilities: Developed applications using Cobol, DB2, and JCL/Job for Bradesco. Worked with JSP/JSF in Java for full-stack development. Participated in database management and maintenance.

experience.title: Trainee Software Developer
experience.responsibilities: Developed backend systems using Cobol and DB2. Provided maintenance and support for financial applications. Collaborated with development teams to improve software quality.

experience.title: Intern
experience.responsibilities: Supported a process management software for dental clinics. Contributed to the migration of the software from Delphi to PHP. Developed front-end features using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

education.degree: Specialization in Data Science and Big Data
education.description: Specialization focused on data science, big data analytics, and related technologies.
Studied principles of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering, focusing on hardware and firmware development.
Qualified in the development, installation, and maintenance of electronic systems, adhering to technical and safety standards.
